EmailTemplate.name: Report Export Template
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
To assign report export permission, we would require approval from the Steering committee member of your division.
Kindly submit your business justification to any Steering Committee members listed below for approval. Approval must be obtained from a member who is representing the Business Division you belong to:
(Steering Committee Members) 1. Edouard Tavernier - Mobility 2. Eric Maldonado - Market Intelligence 3. Ken Honroth - Engineering Solutions 4. Rich Dodds - Commodity Insights 5. Amy Gradnik - Finance 6. Anne Thomas - Digital Technology Services
Upon receiving the approval, please complete the Salesforce GDPR Training in case you have not. The link is - GDPR TRAINING. After the completion of training, you may reply to this email to obtain permission.
Feel free to reach out to us in case of any further queries.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Configuration Team
